entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
